room_title: Escape room "Licastro’s Lair" by Springfield Escape Room in Springfield (MO)
room_description:
During your dream vacation backpacking Europe, your group decides to trek the haunted forests of Romania. Locals warn not to hike here during the night, but you've never been scared of myths or vampires!
Caught by the storm, you seek shelter in an old abandoned-looking castle nearby. As you wander deeper into the castle, you come across a dark room with a mysterious inscription on the wall that claims the nocturnal resident will rise at sundown with a thirst for blood. You try to leave, but the door is now locked.
The sun sets in one hour – you need to escape and save yourselves from the entity before the tales become reality!
